# larsen.studio â€” Sebastian Larsen

Sebastian Larsen is an independent developer building iOS and Shopify apps from Denmark.

## Apps

### CartGoals (Shopify App)
- Live on Shopify App Store: https://apps.shopify.com/cartgoals
- Website: https://cartgoals.com
- Cart gamification app that increases average order value with multi-goal progress bars
- Pricing: Free / $39.99/mo / $69.99/mo
